name: laravel/livewire-starter-kit
description: The official Laravel starter kit for Livewire.

pre-install-cmd: @php -r "@mkdir(__DIR__ . '/bootstrap/cache', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/cache', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/sessions', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/views', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/logs', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/app', 0775, true);"
pre-update-cmd: @php -r "@mkdir(__DIR__ . '/bootstrap/cache', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/cache', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/sessions', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/views', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/logs', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/app', 0775, true);"
post-install-cmd: @php -r "@mkdir(__DIR__ . '/bootstrap/cache', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/cache', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/sessions', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/framework/views', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/logs', 0775, true); @mkdir(__DIR__ . '/storage/app', 0775, true);"
dev: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "npm run dev" --names='server,queue,vite'
